title: Wizard Esports - LF  Head Coach | Ranked 5 Players
body:
A new oceanic League of Legends team | My name is Draco. I have played League of Legends for a number of seasons and am now investing into forming my own team to play in the Oceanic Open Ladder and a variety of other tournaments. All for that single dream to get a team into the Oceanic Challenger Series.

We are still currently competing in the Oceanic Open Ladder and with the re-birth of ranked 5's - we have both teams actively climbing that as well.

**Wizard Team 1 LF | Head Coach**

Wizard Team 1 is currently looking for a head coach to help with the overall improvement of the team.  The head coach will be expected to maintain and lead a healthy environment through which players can perform and improve at maximum level. He will work very closely with myself as we focus on achieving the teams goals. 

**Main Responsibilities**

Key components of the position include but are not limited to:

* Work with the team to construct and maintain a strict training structure
* Facilitate communication and team dynamic issues as they arise
* Create an efficient metric method to highlight improvement and weaknesses
* Attend scheduled team training's and scrims
* Review and watch past matches 

**Minimum Requirements**

* Relative experience in coaching
* Fluency in English
* Must be available and committed to the team
* Professional, energetic and can lead by example
* Must be of the age of 17 +

If you meet these requirements and are interested in this open position feel free to fill out this application below.

[Wizard Head Coach Application](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1UYVl3YH8QCbEVd1EQY65deAcW4QwhJ3aA5BuKLvJEdI/edit)

**Wizard Team 2 LF | Ranked 5s Players**

Wizard Team 2 is currently looking for players to join our ranked 5s team. This also gives a good opportunity for you to sub for Wizard Team 1 if needed. 

**Currently looking for the following roles**

Sub position - Top Lane:
Starting Ranked 5s - Mid Lane:
Starting Ranked 5s - ADC:

**Minimum Requirements**

* Fluency in English
* Must be available and committed to the team
* Professional, energetic and can lead by example
* Must be Platinum 1 + 
* Must be of the age of 15 +

If you meet these requirements and are interested in this open position feel free to fill out this application below.

[Wizard Team 2 | Ranked 5s Application](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1AUF_hQco6yApBZ6SWzocgMr-fqbGBGdpf7WZxR-Xr7w/edit)


I will update below with announcements as they come available. 

Regards

Draco
Owner/Founder of Wizards
